com.digitalpersona.uareu

Interface Reader


  • public interface Reader
    Class represents fingerprint reader.

    Keeps information about reader hardware and capabilities. Provides means to capture fingerprints.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Reader.Capabilities
      Information about reader capabilites.
      static class  Reader.CaptureQuality
      Constants describing result of the capture operation.
      static class  Reader.CaptureResult
      Complete result of the capture operation.
      static class  Reader.Description
      Complete information about reader hardware.
      static class  Reader.Id
      Reader Hardware ID.
      static class  Reader.ImageProcessing
      Constants describing image processing.
      static class  Reader.Modality
      Constants describing reader modality.
      static class  Reader.Priority
      Constants describing priority of the client opening the reader.
      static class  Reader.ReaderStatus
      Constants describing status of the reader.
      static class  Reader.Status
      Describes status of the reader.
      static class  Reader.Technology
      Constants describing reader technology.
      static class  Reader.Version
      Reader hardware version.
      static class  Reader.VersionInfo

    • Method Detail

      • Open

        void Open(Reader.Priority priority)
          throws UareUException
        Opens a reader.
        Throws:
        UareUException - if reader cannot be opened.

      • Close

        void Close()
           throws UareUException
        Releases the reader.
        Throws:
        UareUException - if reader cannot be closed.

      • GetStatus

        Reader.Status GetStatus()
                        throws UareUException
        Returns status of the reader.

        To acquire status reader must be opened.

        Returns:
        Reader.Status object.
        Throws:
        UareUException - if reader cannot be closed.

      • GetCapabilities

        Reader.Capabilities GetCapabilities()
        Returns capabilities of the reader.

        To acquire capabilities reader must be opened.

        Returns:
        Reader.Capabilities object.

      • GetDescription

        Reader.Description GetDescription()
        Returns description of the reader.

        Reader does not have to be opened in order to acquire description.

        Returns:
        Reader.Description object.

      • Capture

        Reader.CaptureResult Capture(Fid.Format format,
                           Reader.ImageProcessing img_proc,
                           int resolution,
                           int timeout)
                             throws UareUException
        Captures a fingerprint image.

        This function captures a fingerprint image from the opened reader device. This function signals the device that a fingerprint is expected and waits until a fingerprint is received. This function blocks until an image is captured, capture fails or timeout is expired. This function cannot be called in streaming mode.

        Parameters:
        format - Format of the image.
        img_proc - Processing of the image.
        resolution - Resolution of the image.
        timeout - Timeout in milliseconds; -1 means no timeout (function will block until a fingerprint is captured).
        Returns:
        Reader.CaptureResult object.
        Throws:
        UareUException - if capture cannot be performed.

      • CancelCapture

        void CancelCapture()
                   throws UareUException
        Cancels pending capture.
        Throws:
        UareUException - if capture cannot be canceled.

      • StartStreaming

        void StartStreaming()
                    throws UareUException
        Puts reader into streaming mode.

        Not all readers support this mode. When the reader is in streaming mode, the application can only call GetStreamImage() to acquire images from the stream.

        Throws:
        UareUException - if failed to start streaming.

      • StopStreaming

        void StopStreaming()
                   throws UareUException
        Stops streaming mode.
        Throws:
        UareUException - if failed to stop streaming.

      • GetStreamImage

        Reader.CaptureResult GetStreamImage(Fid.Format format,
                                  Reader.ImageProcessing img_proc,
                                  int resolution)
                                    throws UareUException
        Takes an image from the stream.

        After the reader is put into streaming mode this function takes an image from the stream. After this function returns, the reader stays in the streaming mode. Frame selection, scoring or other image processing is not performed.

        Parameters:
        format - Format of the image.
        img_proc - Processing of the image.
        resolution - Resolution of the image.
        Returns:
        Reader.CaptureResult object.
        Throws:
        UareUException - if failed to acquire image from the stream.

      • Calibrate

        void Calibrate()
               throws UareUException
        Calibrates the reader.

        This function calibrates a reader and blocks until the calibration is complete. It can take several seconds to calibrate for some devices.

        Throws:
        UareUException - if failed to calibrate the reader.

      • Reset

        void Reset()
           throws UareUException
        Resets the reader.

        This function performs a hardware reset on the reader. Hardware resets are typically needed only after a hardware problem (e.g., the reader is unplugged or receives an electrostatic shock). This function blocks until the reset is complete.

        Throws:
        UareUException - if failed to reset the reader.
